I want my children to carry forward not just my genes but hopefully some of the values I hold dear: curiosity, resilience, and a drive to tackle hard problems.

Being a father to 14 children while running multiple companies is challenging, but I make time for them. They visit my factories, ask me questions about rockets and electric cars, and keep me grounded in what matters most. My goal has always been to help secure a future where humanity thrives, and raising the next generation is perhaps the most important work any of us can do.
